tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE return_shipments (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
return_tracking_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
return_reason TEXT,
return_date DATE,
processing_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
receiver_name VARCHAR(100),
receiver_address TEXT,
received_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE processing_centers (
  center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE return_shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  return_reason TEXT,
  return_status TEXT,
  return_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE return_processing (
  processing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  processed_by VARCHAR(50),
  processing_date DATE,
  return_quantity INT,
  returned_shipment_id INT REFERENCES return_shipments(shipment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE return_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_description TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  related_processing_id INT REFERENCES return_processing(processing_id)
)

CREATE TABLE return_items (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_id INT,
  returned_date DATE,
  item_name VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE return_processing (
  processing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_id INT,
  processed_date DATE,
  processing_type VARCHAR(50),
  processing_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE return_shipments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id UUID,
    return_reason TEXT,
    return_date TIMESTAMP,
    processing_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE return_products (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID,
    quantity INT,
    return_shipment_id UUID,
    condition TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE return_customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE return_receipts (
    receipt_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    return_shipment_id UUID,
    received_date TIMESTAMP,
    received_by TEXT,
    remarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE return_processing (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    return_receipt_id UUID,
    processed_date TIMESTAMP,
    processed_by TEXT,
    processing_status VARCHAR
);
